= Introduction =

Application Design:
High level design is available on SystemArchitecture page.

USE CASE diagram is available on http://code.google.com/p/reco-gnizr/wiki/UMLDiagram page.

= Details =

Detailed Design consists of following components:
 * client UI layout displaying URLs with user feedback options,
 * client component for Web content scraping,
    This component returns the essential HTML content of client webpage.
 * server component that interfaces with the client web page,
 * server component for web content analysis,
    This component extracts the meta information out of the parsed HTML content from client page.
 * bookmark retriever, an interface to gnizr bookmarks database,
    It retrieves the bookmarks from gnizr database based on the meta information generated.
 * user feedback manager at server,
    It updates rating of the bookmark in the database.
